definitions.definition: An incident or event that disgraces or damages the reputation of the persons or organization involved .
examples: Their affair was reported as a scandal by most tabloids.
The incident brought considerable scandal to his family.

definitions.definition: Widespread moral outrage , indignation , as over an offence to decency .
examples: When their behaviour was made public it caused a great scandal .

definitions.definition: A word or deed, lacking in rectitude in some manner, which is an occasion of the spiritual ruin of another.

examples: According to village scandal , they weren't even married.

definitions.definition: amateur or homemade pornography ; ( informal ) commotion .

main_definition: An incident or event that disgraces or damages the reputation of the persons or organization involved .
secondary_definitions: Widespread moral outrage , indignation , as over an offence to decency .
( theology ) A word or deed, lacking in rectitude in some manner, which is an occasion of the spiritual ruin of another.
( Philippines , colloquial ) amateur or homemade pornography ; ( informal ) commotion .
